programme.title: The Concubine
programme.desc: Hwa-yeon, a concubine, faces palace danger after the king's death. A bloody fate awaits all within the palace.

programme.title: HITMAN: AGENT JUN
programme.desc: Jun, a former human weapon turned webtoon artist, must protect his peaceful family life amid a massive battle.

programme.title: Diva
programme.desc: Skill, beauty, personality, ‘Diving Diva’ Lee-young has it all. One day, she is involved in a freak accident.

programme.title: Will You Be There
programme.desc: Soo-hyun saves a life of a little girl and receives ten mysterious pills from the girl’s grandfather.And the movie jumps thirty years back to when Soo-hyun was still a medical student and shows Soo-hyun and his then girlfriend Yeon-a who were very much in love with each other. With the pill's help, Soo-hyun travels back in time and meet his younger self. The movie illustrates in a moving way what it means to love and live with a choice one makes for love.

programme.title: Summer Snow
programme.desc: To protect your loved ones, these three words are enough: 'I'm sorry, I love you, thank you.'

programme.title: The Battle: Roar to Victory
programme.desc: Over a 4 day period, a fierce battle takes place between Korean independence militias and imperialist Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: Mission Possible
programme.desc: To a private investigator Woo Su-han, who will take on any job if it pays the bill, a secret agent Yoo Da-hee comes along with $10,000 in cash. She proposes a joint operation to investigate an arms trafficking case. They attract more attention when they’re together and as the scope of this case increases by the minute, they leave behind evidence that put them on police’s target list...

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A love story between a man who cannot sense anything and a woman with hemophilia.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: Monster Cop Ma tracks drug dealers via app, exposing a brutal Korea-PH gambling ring and dark crimes.

programme.title: The Exclusive
programme.desc: Mu-hyuk's false article on a serial killer makes him famous, but his cover-up traps him in a web of lies.

programme.title: Granny's Got Talent
programme.desc: Korea's biggest cursing tournament begins! Among contesters like a diss rapper and grumpy police, a legendary granny shows who the real potty mouth is.

programme.title: Venus Talk
programme.desc: A story about three women who still seek hot passion at work, love, and sex.
